alert.note: Alert for Brown; Callahan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 8:10PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Callahan and northern Brown Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 809 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorms from Cross Plains to Burkett, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cross Plains, Byrds, Lake Brownwood Near Thrifty, Grosvenor, Lake Brownwood State Park, May, Cross Cut, Lake Brownwood, Owens and Thrifty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
